DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate the effectiveness of a one-to-one, adult-to-youth primary preventive mentoring program in Sweden. Outcome domains and criteria for inclusion and exclusion of study participants are elaborated in collaboration with the providing NGO, and the program is given as customary.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study of a Swedish Youth Mentoring Program
DOC.criteria: a selfreported need of the youth for additional adult contacts current or past regular use of illicit drugs repeated delinquent behaviour or single acts of violence against persons ongoing contacts with psychiatric care or social services
